pages.title: Creating Budding Onyx
pages.text: Crafting $(l:general/onyx_shards)Onyx$() was always very tricky, as it depended on the current phase of the moon. Despite the $(l:magical_items/crescent_clock)Crescent Clock$(/l) being a thing, you often missed that short time window.$(br)Making Onyx growable like the other gems will save you a huge amount of time.$(br2)$(italic)Strangely, the same procedure does not seem to work for the others?

pages.title: Spirit Inst. Recipe
pages.text: Even if it seems expensive, having renewable Onyx seems worth it.$(br2)Best to craft a larger amount of these $(l:general/midnight_aberration)Midnight Aberrations$(/l) all at once, as they seem to crumble in your hands quickly.
